column6: Dove hair fall rescue shampoo is amazing.
column9: Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2019
column14: I have only used this once so far but already see a huge difference in the hair fall. I’m he bottle was small so I was a bit worried but to my surprise it takes a very small amount to lather a lot. Combined this with Dove ritual hair thickening conditioner and my hair looks amazing. I can’t wait to see what continued use will do! I am so glad I tried this before trying any of the other hair growth shampoos on the market. My hair looks, smells and feels great after just one use.

column9: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2022
column14: I didn't check the oz. and usually get a bigger size as there are differences between Canada and the US.  In Canada we have the bigger size.  Otherwise, the loss of hair has change radically and beautiful head of hair.
